author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: َفْسِكَ وَبِابْتِلائِها بَيْنَ جُنُودِ الظَّالِمِيْنَ بِأَنْ تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيَّ مِنْ سَحَابِ رَحْمَتِكَ ما يَجْعَلُنِي مُقَدَّسَةً عَمَّا سِواكَ لأَكُونَ لائِقَةً لِذِكْرِكَ وَقابِلَةً لِحُبِّكَ،
translation: I beseech Thee, by the wrong Thou hast suffered and the ills inflicted upon Thee by the hosts of wrongful doers, to send down upon me from the clouds of Thy mercy that which will purify me of all that is not of Thee, that I may be worthy to praise Thee and fit to love Thee.
